about_the_game:
From spiritual to epic, there's something for everyone in this versatile new pack.

Composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, and inspired by some of the most beloved orchestral themes, Rebel Rapture draws on the power of voices to deliver an incredible musical medley. Whether you're looking for a spiritual theme to give your churches a feeling of awe, or want that epic hard rocking boss theme, Rebel Rapture is the pack for you! In addition to choir themes, this pack also features instrumental orchestral pieces and blazing hard rock / heavy metal themes that will find a cozy home in your projects.

This pack contains:

  • 27 music BGM themes.
  • Epic orchestral themes suitable for battles or intense encounters.
  • Classic and spiritual choir themes suitable for religious, mystical or forbidden places, energetic hard rock / metal themes.
  • .mp3, .ogg and .m4a formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Armageddon
2 - Armies Advance
3 - Cathedral Choir
4 - Dark Ominous
5 - Dream World
6 - Either Side of Eternity
7 - Either Side of Eternity (Instrumental)
8 - Glory and Benevolence
9 - Hallelujah Agnus Dei
10 - Medieval Requiem
11 - Metal Warrior
12 - Middle Earth Fire Mountain
13 - Morte Aeterna
14 - Mysterious Angel
15 - New World Horizon
16 - Reverence - Norse Gods
17 - Solo Female Lament
18 - Sunny Village
19 - Super Boss
20 - Super Rev
21 - The Epic Burana
22 - The Legend of Cragg
23 - Triumphant Journey
24 - War and Conquest
25 - Your Fate is in Your Hands
26 - Elven Angel Lament
27 - Dark Ominous (no DrumLoop)
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Rebel Rapture Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Rebel Rapture Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
